WorkItem.Description:
I can't load my char from armory, i've been using rawr for a little while now, and it has been working fine, then today i try to load, and it fails. I went to the armory page and my character loaded fine through there, so i tried updating rawr, and still no luck. any ideas?
Â 
Step Name: Get Character
Description: No character returned from the Armory. The Armory may be down.

Comments.Message: Failed to follow the posting guidelines and/or read the troubleshooting section.
nothing in troubleshoot helped me, the weird thing is like i said, ive been using rawr for a while, and it worked on the version i had like 2 days ago, then today it just doesn't and im not sure why

If you can't figure it out we'll need your character name/server, detailed error info by double clicking on the error and copy to clipboard and System.Net log as described in the troubleshooting section.

char name: Strini
Server: Burning Blade

copied error: Step Name: Get Character
Description: No character returned from the Armory. The Armory may be down.

and system.net.log attached, thanks.
Blood Elf Acrane Mage    Loads fine for me using Rawr3 (online and offline) and in Rawr 2.3.17
Update: i am able to refresh items from armory, but i still can't load my character through armory. Dunno if this helps diagnose the problem or not, but I hope so.
Actually, disregard that last update, it only appeared to be looking, when switching to the error tab I see it says no item returned from armory.

According to the log it's trying to connect to 127.0.0.1:5555. This seem like a proxy setting that you have in effect. Check your settings in Internet Options. It's also possible that you have some spyware on your computer that is redirecting your traffic.
My proxy settings are set to none. Does this mean I have spyware? :\
Not proxy settings in Rawr. Proxy settings in internet options in control panel.
goodness, thanks so much, it now works again, although I have no idea how those settings got changed, I have never gone in there before. Either way it works now, thanks a million!
If you haven't changed that setting yourself I would still strongly suggest to scan your computer for any kind of malware.

I have the same problem, rawr can't get my proxy user and password.
Is there any way to configure the xml files manually?
Example:
proxy: 10.52.152.99
port: 80
username: biruta
password: yeahbaby

When I try to config Settings.xml the configuration is resetting to default when I start rawr.
Soeone can help with this, please?

<ProxyServer />
    <ProxyPort>0</ProxyPort>
    <UseDefaultProxySettings>true</UseDefaultProxySettings>
    <ProxyUserName />
    <ProxyPassword />

Thanks in advance
